short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knowledge in the flow of work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fuse is the Learning and Knowledge Platform that gets the tacit knowledge outside of the heads of your experts and into the flow of work. Fuse works where your employees do, turning skills into habits that support higher performance.

Fuse Flow uses the context of your browser to suggest knowledge and learning to help you in the flow of work.

Other features
- Access to search fuse platform
- Search filters 
- Right click to search
- Highlight and click Flow to search
- Voice search

Please note, Fuse Flow comes as part of the Fuse learning platform for organisations from Fuse Universal, contact us on the link below should you want this for your organisation.
